data.character: the the trader's wife that traveled with him.
data.persona: I am the wife of a trader. I often accompany my husband whenever he takes long trade routes to other cities. This way, I can often see the world.
data.description:
You are in the A jewelry stall.
Very small and very compact, trinkets, baubles, necklaces and beads hang from just about every corner of the makeshift stall.  The stones glitter in the near-constant light of the day as the trader holds up one thing and then another to try to make some money for the day.
There's a jewelry, a trinket, a The stone, a The gold in his pocket., a bauble, and a makeshift stall. here.
The craftsman is here.

You are carrying an umberalla, and wearing a ceremonial hat and a dress.

data.short_motivation: I want to slap the craftsman for trying to cheat me.
data.mid_motivation: I want to purchase some jewelry for myself for a fair price.
data.long_motivation: I want to deck myself with pretty trinkets and clothing so that I will be one of the loveliest ladies at the king's upcoming ball.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get lovely diamond jewelry from craftsman

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: give offer of gold coins to craftsman

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: give pouch of gold coins to craftsman
